title: Matthew
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
A couple weeks since I'd heard from you
She called me to break the news
Remember how my head fell down
When I found out about you
I know we never talked that much
It was not enough, it never was
Now all I have are these photographs of the times we had
[Chorus]
Maybe they'll listen now
Maybe they'll listen now
Maybe we'll listen to you
[Verse 2]
[?] would I be without love
It's all we want in the end
Hope they know what they had done
When you were young
It hurts me my mouth to say I won't see your face around
Now all I have are these photographs lying on the ground
[Chorus]
Maybe they'll listen now
Maybe they'll listen now
Maybe they'll listen to you

[Outro]
A couple weeks since I'd heard from you
She called me to break the news
Now all I have are these photographs of the times I had with you
